SELECT SUD.USER_ID, SU.USER_NM, SU.USER_LOGN_ID AS USER_LOGN_ID, SUD.DLG_SEQ, SUD.DLG_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = SUD.DLG_UID) AS DLG_NM, (SELECT USER_LOGN_ID FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = SUD.DLG_UID) AS DLG_LOGN_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DLG_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DLG_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(GBK_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GBK_DT, SUD.DLG_REA, SUD.DLG_PROC_CD, CASE WHEN SUD.RJT_DS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' END AS RJT_YN, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = SUD.DLG_PROC_CD) AS DLG_PROC_NM, SUD.DLG_APR_REQ_IDX, SUD.RJT_UID, SUD.RJT_DS, TO_CHAR(SUD.RJT_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RJT_DT, SUD.RJT_REA, SUD.DLG_STT_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = SUD.DLG_STT_CD) AS DLG_STT_NM FROM SY_USER_DLG SUD LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU ON SUD.USER_ID = SU.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND SUD.DLG_STT_CD = #{dlgSttCd}
AND SU.USER_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{userNm}) || '%'
AND SUD.DLG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{dlgDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{dlgDtList[1]})
ORDER BY SUD.DLG_SEQ DESC
